languages.text: Ambull Mother emerges from under ground making all nearby enemies make an AGI test or fall prone.

traits.locale_text: Ambull Mother emerges from under ground making all nearby enemies make an AGI test or fall prone.

languages.text: The ambull mother emerges to the surface. All enemies adjacent to where she emerges must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
languages.original_text: Амбулл-матка выкапывается на поверхность. Противники на клетках, соседних с местом ее появления, совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ambull mother emerges to the surface. All enemies adjacent to the place of her appearance must pass an Agility resistance test or fall prone.

The ambull mother emerges to the surface. All enemies adjacent to where she emerges must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

The ambull mother emerges to the surface. All enemies adjacent to where she emerges must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

languages.text: Амбулл-матка выкапывается на поверхность. Противники на клетках, соседних с местом ее появления, совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.
languages.original_text: The ambull mother emerges to the surface. All enemies adjacent to where she emerges must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Амбулл-матка выкапывается на поверхность. Противники на клетках, соседних с местом ее появления, совершают проверку Ловкости на сопротивление и в случае провала оказываются опрокинуты.

languages.text: Anne ambul, yüzeye çıkar. Belirdiği yerin bitişiğindeki tüm düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilirler{/g}.
languages.original_text: The ambull mother emerges to the surface. All enemies adjacent to where she emerges must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Anne ambul, yüzeye çıkar. Belirdiği yerin bitişiğindeki tüm düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilirler{/g}.

languages.text: La madre ambull sale a la superficie. Todos los enemigos adyacentes al lugar por el que emerge deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} para no ser {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.
languages.original_text: The ambull mother emerges to the surface. All enemies adjacent to where she emerges must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La madre ambull sale a la superficie. Todos los enemigos adyacentes al lugar por el que emerge deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} para no ser {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.

languages.text: 蚁牛族母返回地面，现身地点邻近格子的所有敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: The ambull mother emerges to the surface. All enemies adjacent to where she emerges must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 蚁牛族母返回地面，现身地点邻近格子的所有敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。

languages.text: La mère ambull refait surface. Les ennemis adjacents à l'endroit où elle sort doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, sans quoi ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysés{/g}.
languages.original_text: The ambull mother emerges to the surface. All enemies adjacent to where she emerges must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La mère ambull refait surface. Les ennemis adjacents à l'endroit où elle sort doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, sans quoi ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysés{/g}.

languages.text: アンブルマザーが地表に現れる。出現した場所に隣接するすべての敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。
languages.original_text: The ambull mother emerges to the surface. All enemies adjacent to where she emerges must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: アンブルマザーが地表に現れる。出現した場所に隣接するすべての敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。

languages.text: Die Ambullenmutter bricht durch die Oberfläche. Alle Gegner auf benachbarten Feldern müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: The ambull mother emerges to the surface. All enemies adjacent to where she emerges must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Ambullenmutter bricht durch die Oberfläche. Alle Gegner auf benachbarten Feldern müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} zu werden.
